name: automl-orchestrator
description: This script executes, in the correct order, all the steps from the BigML AutoML

inputs.name: orchestrator-exec
inputs.description: Previous execution of this script, to reuse created executions and models, e.g. execution/5d272205eba31d61920005cd

outputs.name: output-dataset
outputs.description: Dataset with final predictions for the test dataset

outputs.name: unsupervised-generation-exec
outputs.description: Execution id of the unsupervised-models script

outputs.name: feature-generation-exec
outputs.description: Execution id of the feature-generation script

outputs.name: feature-selection-exec
outputs.description: Execution id of the feature selection script

outputs.name: auto-model-exec
outputs.description: Execution id of the auto-model script
